title: Stone & Sun
description: The epic journey concludes at the summit of the world-wall …By meddling with the magical structure of Stone, Jonah Lightfoot has created a duplicate of the entire world-wall. This twinning of the worlds has made it possible for the evil dragon Archan to rise once more.Desperate to vanquish their enemy, Jonah and his companions set out on a hazardous quest to climb the vertiginous face of Stone. At the very top of the world-wall lies Sunlight Pass, the arena in which they will face Archan for the final time and the place where all the memories of the Stone converge into a single strand.The battle for the future is about to begin – but the key to victory lies deep in the past.“This is not another collection of fantasy clichés, but something rich and strange” LineOne
author: Graham Edwards
